name: The Adventures of Berry The Space Poodle
name_original: The Adventures of Berry The Space Poodle
description:
Hello all
So this is my latest project - The Adventures of Berry the Space Poodle.

It's still in the beta version or alpha version whatever you wanna call it -

anyway if you see any bugs please point them out in the comments

eventually this game will be finished

the controls are A and D for horizontal movement

W for jump

Spacebar for entering levels

and to click a button move your cursor over the button and press left click

have fun
